long_desc.thetext: Currently, there is a mix of tests and demos in the demo browser. Those tests do not belong in something like the demo browser where visitors take a look at the framework and its components. Therefore, we could add a mode switching for the DemoBrowser which has in its standard mode only a couple of demos to show, some showcase demos for example. A second mode could offer a full list of all demos for the interested visitor and the third mode could be the developer mode where all tests are included. Maybe this mode could be switched by a button in the toolbar (at lesast for the first two modes). The developer mode could be set via URL parameter or a secret key combination or something like that.

The demos can now be tagged with the "test" key and hide/shown checking the CheckBox in the debug menu.
Added on trunk with r26780.
